duties_responsibilities.duty: Recruit and train new brokers and agents for independent contract work in the financial industry.
Provide customer service and support to broker/agent teams to assist with team building and development.
Data entry and record-keeping related to broker/agent activities and financial transactions.
Leadership and mentoring of new broker/agent recruits to ensure compliance and success in the industry.
Manage flex schedules and independent work arrangements for broker/agent teams.

education_certification.credential: No specific degree or certification mentioned. Willing to train individuals with no experience.
